verses.verse: וּמִן־ <WH4480> u-min- from הַתְּכֵ֤לֶת <WH8504> hat-te-Che-let And of the blue וְהָֽאַרְגָּמָן֙ <WH713> ve-ha-'ar-ga-Man and purple וְתוֹלַ֣עַת <WH8438> ve-to-La-'at oppressor הַשָּׁנִ֔י <WH8144> hash-sha-Ni, and scarlet עָשׂ֥וּ <WH6213> 'a-Su they made בִגְדֵי־ <WH899> vig-dei- cloths שְׂרָ֖ד <WH8278> se-Rad of service לְשָׁרֵ֣ת <WH8334> le-sha-Ret to do service בַּקֹּ֑דֶשׁ <WH6944> bak-Ko-desh; in the holy וַֽיַּעֲשׂ֞וּ <WH6213> vai-ya-'a-Su [place] and made אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- בִּגְדֵ֤י <WH899> big-Dei garments הַקֹּ֙דֶשׁ֙ <WH6944> hak-Ko-desh the holy אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which לְאַהֲרֹ֔ן <WH175> le-'a-ha-Ron, for Aaron כַּאֲשֶׁ֛ר <WH834> ka-'a-Sher which צִוָּ֥ה <WH6680> tziv-Vah commanded יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> Yah-weh as the LORD אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- מֹשֶֽׁה׃ <WH4872> mo-Sheh. Moses פ Peh

וַיַּ֖עַשׂ <WH6213> vai-Ya-'as And he made אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הָאֵפֹ֑ד <WH646> ha-'e-Fod; the ephod זָהָ֗ב <WH2091> za-Hav, [of] gold תְּכֵ֧לֶת <WH8504> te-Che-let blue וְאַרְגָּמָ֛ן <WH713> ve-'ar-ga-Man and purple וְתוֹלַ֥עַת <WH8438> ve-to-La-'at oppressor שָׁנִ֖י <WH8144> sha-Ni and scarlet וְשֵׁ֥שׁ <WH8336> ve-Shesh linen מָשְׁזָֽר׃ <WH7806> ma-she-Zar. and fine twined

וַֽיְרַקְּע֞וּ <WH7554> vay-rak-ke-'U And they did beat אֶת־ <WH854> 'et- into פַּחֵ֣י <WH6341> pa-Chei thin plates הַזָּהָב֮ <WH2091> haz-za-Hav the gold וְקִצֵּ֣ץ <WH7112> ve-kitz-Tzetz and cut פְּתִילִם֒ <WH6616> pe-ti-Lim [it into] wires לַעֲשׂ֗וֹת <WH6213> la-'a-Sot, to be woven בְּת֤וֹךְ <WH8432> be-Toch hope הַתְּכֵ֙לֶת֙ <WH8504> hat-te-Che-let [it] in the blue וּבְת֣וֹךְ <WH8432> u-ve-Toch hope הָֽאַרְגָּמָ֔ן <WH713> ha-'ar-ga-Man, and in the purple וּבְת֛וֹךְ <WH8432> u-ve-Toch hope תּוֹלַ֥עַת <WH8438> to-La-'at oppressor הַשָּׁנִ֖י <WH8144> hash-sha-Ni and the scarlet וּבְת֣וֹךְ <WH8432> u-ve-Toch hope הַשֵּׁ֑שׁ <WH8336> hash-Shesh; and in the fine linen מַעֲשֵׂ֖ה <WH4639> ma-'a-Seh work חֹשֵֽׁב׃ <WH2803> cho-Shev. [with] cunning

כְּתֵפֹ֥ת <WH3802> ke-te-Fot shoulderpieces עָֽשׂוּ־ <WH6213> 'a-su- They made ל֖וֹ lo חֹבְרֹ֑ת <WH2266> choe-Rot; for it to couple [it] together עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- and שְׁנֵ֥י <WH8147> she-Nei by the two; קִצְוֹותֹו kitz-vo-tov כקְצֹותָ֖יו <WH7118> ke-tzo-Tav end קחֻבָּֽר׃ <WH2266> chub-Bar. was it coupled together

וְחֵ֨שֶׁב <WH2805> ve-Che-shev And the curious girdle אֲפֻדָּת֜וֹ <WH642> a-fud-da-To of his ephod אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which עָלָ֗יו <WH5921> 'a-Lav, of מִמֶּ֣נּוּ <WH4480> mi-Men-nu the same הוּא֮ <WH1931> hu its כְּמַעֲשֵׂהוּ֒ <WH4639> ke-ma-'a-se-Hu that [was] upon it [was] of the same according to the work זָהָ֗ב <WH2091> za-Hav, thereof [of] gold תְּכֵ֧לֶת <WH8504> te-Che-let blue וְאַרְגָּמָ֛ן <WH713> ve-'ar-ga-Man and purple וְתוֹלַ֥עַת <WH8438> ve-to-La-'at oppressor שָׁנִ֖י <WH8144> sha-Ni and scarlet וְשֵׁ֣שׁ <WH8336> ve-Shesh linen מָשְׁזָ֑ר <WH7806> ma-she-Zar; and fine twined כַּאֲשֶׁ֛ר <WH834> ka-'a-Sher which צִוָּ֥ה <WH6680> tziv-Vah commanded יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> Yah-weh as the LORD אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- מֹשֶֽׁה׃ <WH4872> mo-Sheh. Moses

וַֽיַּעֲשׂוּ֙ <WH6213> vai-ya-'a-Su And they wrought אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- אַבְנֵ֣י <WH68> 'av-Nei stones הַשֹּׁ֔הַם <WH7718> hash-Sho-ham, onyx מֻֽסַבֹּ֖ת <WH4142> mu-sab-Bot inclosed מִשְׁבְּצֹ֣ת <WH4865> mish-be-Tzot in ouches זָהָ֑ב <WH2091> za-Hav; of gold מְפֻתָּחֹת֙ <WH6605> me-fut-ta-Chot graven פִּתּוּחֵ֣י <WH6605> pit-tu-Chei were engraved חוֹתָ֔ם <WH2368> cho-Tam, as signets עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- according שְׁמ֖וֹת <WH8034> she-Mot with the names בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> be-Nei of the children יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El. of Israel

וַיָּ֣שֶׂם <WH7760> vai-Ya-sem And he put אֹתָ֗ם <WH853> 'o-Tam, עַ֚ל <WH5921> 'al on כִּתְפֹ֣ת <WH3802> kit-Fot them on the shoulders הָאֵפֹ֔ד <WH646> ha-'e-Fod, of the ephod אַבְנֵ֥י <WH68> 'av-Nei [that they should be] stones זִכָּר֖וֹן <WH2146> zik-ka-Ron for a memorial לִבְנֵ֣י <WH1121> liv-Nei to the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El; of Israel כַּאֲשֶׁ֛ר <WH834> ka-'a-Sher after צִוָּ֥ה <WH6680> tziv-Vah commanded יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> Yah-weh as the LORD אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- מֹשֶֽׁה׃ <WH4872> mo-Sheh. Moses פ Peh

וַיַּ֧עַשׂ <WH6213> vai-Ya-'as And he made אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הַחֹ֛שֶׁן <WH2833> ha-Cho-shen the breastplate מַעֲשֵׂ֥ה <WH4639> ma-'a-Seh work חֹשֵׁ֖ב <WH2803> cho-Shev [of] cunning כְּמַעֲשֵׂ֣ה <WH4639> ke-ma-'a-Seh like the work אֵפֹ֑ד <WH646> 'e-Fod; of the ephod זָהָ֗ב <WH2091> za-Hav, [of] gold תְּכֵ֧לֶת <WH8504> te-Che-let blue וְאַרְגָּמָ֛ן <WH713> ve-'ar-ga-Man and purple וְתוֹלַ֥עַת <WH8438> ve-to-La-'at oppressor שָׁנִ֖י <WH8144> sha-Ni and scarlet וְשֵׁ֥שׁ <WH8336> ve-Shesh linen מָשְׁזָֽר׃ <WH7806> ma-she-Zar. and fine twined

רָב֧וּעַ <WH7251> ra-Vu-a' It was foursquare הָיָ֛ה <WH1961> ha-Yah become כָּפ֖וּל <WH3717> ka-Ful double עָשׂ֣וּ <WH6213> 'a-Su they made אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הַחֹ֑שֶׁן <WH2833> ha-Cho-shen; the breastplate זֶ֧רֶת <WH2239> Ze-ret a span אָרְכּ֛וֹ <WH753> a-re-Ko [was] the length וְזֶ֥רֶת <WH2239> ve-Ze-ret thereof and a span רָחְבּ֖וֹ <WH7341> ra-che-Bo the breadth כָּפֽוּל׃ <WH3717> ka-Ful. thereof [being] doubled

וַיְמַלְאוּ־ <WH4390> vay-mal-'u- And they set ב֔וֹ vo, אַרְבָּעָ֖ה <WH702> 'ar-ba-'Ah in it four ט֣וּרֵי <WH2905> Tu-rei rows אָ֑בֶן <WH68> 'A-ven; of stones ט֗וּר <WH2905> Tur, [the first] row אֹ֤דֶם <WH124> 'O-dem [was] a sardius פִּטְדָה֙ <WH6357> pit-Dah a topaz וּבָרֶ֔קֶת <WH1304> u-va-Re-ket, and a carbuncle הַטּ֖וּר <WH2905> hat-Tur row הָאֶחָֽד׃ <WH259> ha-'e-Chad. this [was] the first

וְהַטּ֖וּר <WH2905> ve-hat-Tur row הַשֵּׁנִ֑י <WH8145> hash-she-Ni; And the second נֹ֥פֶךְ <WH5306> No-fech an emerald סַפִּ֖יר <WH5601> sap-Pir a sapphire וְיָהֲלֹֽם׃ <WH3095> ve-ya-ha-Lom. and a diamond

וְהַטּ֖וּר <WH2905> ve-hat-Tur row הַשְּׁלִישִׁ֑י <WH7992> hash-she-li-Shi; And the third לֶ֥שֶׁם <WH3958> Le-shem a ligure שְׁב֖וֹ <WH7618> she-Vo an agate וְאַחְלָֽמָה׃ <WH306> ve-'ach-La-mah. and an amethyst

וְהַטּוּר֙ <WH2905> ve-hat-Tur row הָֽרְבִיעִ֔י <WH7243> ha-re-vi-'I, And the fourth תַּרְשִׁ֥ישׁ <WH8658> tar-Shish a beryl שֹׁ֖הַם <WH7718> Sho-ham an onyx וְיָשְׁפֵ֑ה <WH3471> ve-ya-she-Peh; and a jasper מֽוּסַבֹּ֛ת <WH4142> mu-sab-Bot [they were] inclosed מִשְׁבְּצ֥וֹת <WH4865> mish-be-Tzot in ouches זָהָ֖ב <WH2091> za-Hav of gold בְּמִלֻּאֹתָֽם׃ <WH4396> be-mil-lu-'o-Tam. in their inclosings

וְ֠הָאֲבָנִים <WH68> Ve-ha-'a-va-nim And the stones עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- were corresponding שְׁמֹ֨ת <WH8034> she-Mot [were] according to the names בְּנֵי־ <WH1121> be-nei- of the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֥ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El of Israel הֵ֛נָּה <WH2007> Hen-nah in שְׁתֵּ֥ים <WH8147> she-Teim both עֶשְׂרֵ֖ה <WH6240> 'es-Reh ten עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- corresponding שְׁמֹתָ֑ם <WH8034> she-mo-Tam; according to their names פִּתּוּחֵ֤י <WH6603> pit-tu-Chei [like] the engravings חֹתָם֙ <WH2368> cho-Tam of a signet אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> 'ish every one עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- were corresponding שְׁמ֔וֹ <WH8034> she-Mo, with his name לִשְׁנֵ֥ים <WH8147> lish-Neim both עָשָׂ֖ר <WH6240> 'a-Sar ten שָֽׁבֶט׃ <WH7626> Sha-vet. tribes

וַיַּעֲשׂ֧וּ <WH6213> vai-ya-'a-Su And they made עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- on הַחֹ֛שֶׁן <WH2833> ha-Cho-shen upon the breastplate שַׁרְשְׁרֹ֥ת <WH8333> shar-she-Rot chains גַּבְלֻ֖ת <WH1383> gav-Lut at the ends מַעֲשֵׂ֣ה <WH4639> ma-'a-Seh work עֲבֹ֑ת <WH5688> 'a-Vot; [of] wreathen זָהָ֖ב <WH2091> za-Hav gold טָהֽוֹר׃ <WH2889> ta-Hor. [of] pure

וַֽיַּעֲשׂ֗וּ <WH6213> vai-ya-'a-Su, And they made שְׁתֵּי֙ <WH8147> she-Tei two מִשְׁבְּצֹ֣ת <WH4865> mish-be-Tzot ouches זָהָ֔ב <WH2091> za-Hav, [of] gold וּשְׁתֵּ֖י <WH8147> u-she-Tei and two טַבְּעֹ֣ת <WH2885> tab-be-'Ot rings זָהָ֑ב <WH2091> za-Hav; gold וַֽיִּתְּנ֗וּ <WH5414> vai-yit-te-Nu, and put אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- שְׁתֵּי֙ <WH8147> she-Tei the two הַטַּבָּעֹ֔ת <WH2885> hat-tab-ba-'Ot, rings עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- on שְׁנֵ֖י <WH8147> she-Nei in the two קְצ֥וֹת <WH7098> ke-Tzot ends הַחֹֽשֶׁן׃ <WH2833> ha-Cho-shen. of the breastplate

וַֽיִּתְּנ֗וּ <WH5414> vai-yit-te-Nu, And they put שְׁתֵּי֙ <WH8147> she-Tei the two הָעֲבֹתֹ֣ת <WH5688> ha-'a-vo-Tot wreathen chains הַזָּהָ֔ב <WH2091> haz-za-Hav, of gold עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- in שְׁתֵּ֖י <WH8147> she-Tei in the two הַטַּבָּעֹ֑ת <WH2885> hat-tab-ba-'Ot; rings עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- at קְצ֖וֹת <WH7098> ke-Tzot on the ends הַחֹֽשֶׁן׃ <WH2833> ha-Cho-shen. of the breastplate

וְאֵ֨ת <WH853> ve-'Et שְׁתֵּ֤י <WH8147> she-Tei And the two קְצוֹת֙ <WH7098> ke-tzOt ends שְׁתֵּ֣י <WH8147> she-Tei of the two הָֽעֲבֹתֹ֔ת <WH5688> ha-'a-vo-Tot, wreathen נָתְנ֖וּ <WH5414> na-te-Nu they fastened עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- on שְׁתֵּ֣י <WH8147> she-Tei in the two הַֽמִּשְׁבְּצֹ֑ת <WH4865> ham-mish-be-Tzot; ouches וַֽיִּתְּנֻ֛ם <WH5414> vai-yit-te-Num and put עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- on כִּתְפֹ֥ת <WH3802> kit-Fot them on the shoulderpieces הָאֵפֹ֖ד <WH646> ha-'e-Fod of the ephod אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- about מ֥וּל <WH4136> mul it פָּנָֽיו׃ <WH6440> pa-Nav. before

וַֽיַּעֲשׂ֗וּ <WH6213> vai-ya-'a-Su, And they made שְׁתֵּי֙ <WH8147> she-Tei two טַבְּעֹ֣ת <WH2885> tab-be-'Ot rings זָהָ֔ב <WH2091> za-Hav, of gold וַיָּשִׂ֕ימוּ <WH7760> vai-ya-Si-mu and put עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- on שְׁנֵ֖י <WH8147> she-Nei [them] on the two קְצ֣וֹת <WH7098> ke-Tzot ends הַחֹ֑שֶׁן <WH2833> ha-Cho-shen; of the breastplate עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- and שְׂפָת֕וֹ <WH8193> se-fa-To upon the border אֲשֶׁ֛ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- about עֵ֥בֶר <WH5676> 'E-ver of it which [was] on the side הָאֵפֹ֖ד <WH646> ha-'e-Fod of the ephod בָּֽיְתָה׃ <WH1004> Ba-ye-tah. inward

וַֽיַּעֲשׂוּ֮ <WH6213> vai-ya-'a-Su And they made שְׁתֵּ֣י <WH8147> she-Tei two טַבְּעֹ֣ת <WH2885> tab-be-'Ot rings זָהָב֒ <WH2091> za-Hav [other] golden וַֽיִּתְּנֻ֡ם <WH5414> vai-yit-te-Num and put עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- of שְׁתֵּי֩ <WH8147> she-Tei them on the two כִתְפֹ֨ת <WH3802> chit-Fot sides הָאֵפֹ֤ד <WH646> ha-'e-Fod of the ephod מִלְמַ֙טָּה֙ <WH4295> mil-Mat-tah underneath מִמּ֣וּל <WH4136> mi-Mul toward פָּנָ֔יו <WH6440> pa-Nav, the forepart לְעֻמַּ֖ת <WH5980> le-'um-Mat of it over against מֶחְבַּרְתּ֑וֹ <WH4225> mech-bar-To; the [other] coupling מִמַּ֕עַל <WH4605> mi-Ma-'al thereof above לְחֵ֖שֶׁב <WH2805> le-Che-shev the curious girdle הָאֵפֹֽד׃ <WH646> ha-'e-Fod. of the ephod

וַיִּרְכְּס֣וּ <WH7405> vai-yir-ke-Su And they did bind אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הַחֹ֡שֶׁן <WH2833> ha-Cho-shen the breastplate מִטַּבְּעֹתָיו֩ <WH2885> mit-tab-be-'o-Tav by his rings אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to טַבְּעֹ֨ת <WH2885> tab-be-'Ot unto the rings הָאֵפֹ֜ד <WH646> ha-'e-Fod of the ephod בִּפְתִ֣יל <WH6616> bif-Til with a lace תְּכֵ֗לֶת <WH8504> te-Che-let, of blue לִֽהְיֹת֙ <WH1961> lih-Yot become עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- above חֵ֣שֶׁב <WH2805> Che-shev that it might be above the curious girdle הָאֵפֹ֔ד <WH646> ha-'e-Fod, of the ephod וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> ve-lo- not יִזַּ֣ח <WH2118> yiz-Zach might not be loosed הַחֹ֔שֶׁן <WH2833> ha-Cho-shen, and that the breastplate מֵעַ֖ל <WH5921> me-'Al from הָאֵפֹ֑ד <WH646> ha-'e-Fod; from the ephod כַּאֲשֶׁ֛ר <WH834> ka-'a-Sher after צִוָּ֥ה <WH6680> tziv-Vah commanded יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> Yah-weh as the LORD אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- מֹשֶֽׁה׃ <WH4872> mo-Sheh. Moses
